title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Intermediate Immersion Chinese Learning Program Based on Real-Life Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese grammar and conversational proficiency (equivalent to HSK Level 2-3)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Achieve intermediate-level speaking and writing proficiency (HSK Level 4) through real-life scenario-based PBL task performance.
Acquire the ability to use language appropriately in context through local cultural analysis.
Achieve a completion rate of over 90% for collaborative projects with peer learners and native speakers
Achieve an implementation rate of over 80% for real-time feedback using mobile devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
